text: Karel Goppold (15 December 1894 - 1956) was a Bohemian fencer. He competed in the individual épée event at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1894 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Czech male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Bohemia Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics
title: Karel Goppold
